channel.title: Reason of MoparScape Client's error!
channel.description:
[b][u]Reason of MoparScape Client's error[/u][/b] [b]okay guys, i know some reason why your moparscape client is error... lets see the reason below:
• you haven't download cache file • you're not on administrator computer[/b]
[b][u]how to solve problem 1? ( haven't download cache file )[/u][/b] first, open your web browser then follow the steps below: type in the website on your site address box [code]www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip[/code] and you're now begin downloading the cache file of moparscape after downloaded the cache file, extract it to your c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\ then you're done!
[b][u]how to solve problem 2? ( not on administrator computer )[/u][/b] ◘ log in to your administrator computer then download the moparscape client to your administrator computer's desktop and install it, then you're done!
[b]Notes: if the guide is not working or no use, please reply me and i will help you :D[/b]

item.title: Reason of MoparScape Client's error!
item.dc:creator: @Hitsofear Hitsofear
item.description:
@Hitsofear wrote:

Reason of MoparScape Client’s error
[b]okay guys, i know some reason why your moparscape client is error… lets see the reason below:

• you haven’t download cache file
• you’re not on administrator computer[/b]

how to solve problem 1? ( haven’t download cache file )
first, open your web browser then follow the steps below:
type in the website on your site address box

www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip

and you’re now begin downloading the cache file of moparscape
after downloaded the cache file, extract it to your c:\windows.mpr_file_store_32
then you’re done!

how to solve problem 2? ( not on administrator computer )
◘ log in to your administrator computer
then download the moparscape client to your administrator computer’s desktop
and install it, then you’re done!

Notes: if the guide is not working or no use, please reply me and i will help you
